name: PopSnake
0:
”Alexa open pop snake”
”Alexa open pop snake and start game”
”Alexa open pop snake and start a two player game”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pop snake
Developer Terms of Use
des:
- Your aim is to turn your PopSnake into a music mogul. You'll hear a song with a related question. The question has a numeric answer. Just guess the answer as close as possible! You get music credits everytime you hit the mark and your PopSnake's success level grows. However, get a question wrong and your out of the record industry and have to start over!

- You have lifelines to keep your progress! Use your lifelines to keep your PopSnake in the running. Pick up where you leave off to continue playing.

-Compete to get the world's most successful PopSnake in daily, weekly and all time leaderboards. Have some fun, learn some cool music trivia and sharpen your competitive edge!

-Upgrading to PopSnake Premium gives you additional hint modes and multiplayer modes. Hint mode will give you a ballpark number range to help you, or a selection of numbers that the answer could be! Multiplayer mode pits you against your friends directly in short rounds.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
